For more information, please refer to ", "url": "https://github.com/t5a/t5a.github.io/blob/master/LICENSE", "title": "$:/plugins/ajh/plugintools/license", "tags": "$:/tags/License", "license-type": "Unlicense" }, "$:/plugins/ajh/plugintools/list": { "text": "{ "tiddlers": { <$list filter="""[list[$:/plugins/ajh/plugintools/list]butlast[]]""">"<$text text=<>/>": <$text text=<>/>, <$list filter="""[list[$:/plugins/ajh/plugintools/list]last[]]""">"<$text text=<>/>": <$text text=<>/> } }", "title": "$:/plugins/ajh/plugintools/list", "list": "" }, "$:/plugins/ajh/plugintools/plugin": { "text": "{ "tiddlers": {} }", "type": "application/json", "title": "$:/plugins/ajh/plugintools/plugin", "plugin-type": "Generally plugin, language or theme", "description": "Description of plugin", "dependents": "", "name": "Brief name of the plugin", "list": "readme license" }, "$:/plugins/ajh/plugintools/readme": { "text": "\define my-svg() \end This plugin is an alternative to packaging a plugin using [[Node.js|http://tiddlywiki.com/#TiddlyWiki%20on%20Node.js]] or the [[browser developer console|http://tiddlywiki.com/dev/#How%20to%20create%20plugins%20in%20the%20browser]]. This plugin adds the <$list filter='[prefix[yes]]'><$vars fill='#000' stroke={{$:/plugins/ajh/plugintools/stylesheet!!button-outline-color}} p={{$:/plugins/ajh/plugintools/image!!path}}><> <$list filter='[prefix[yes]]'>{{$:/language/Buttons/Shadow/Caption}} plugintools button to the View Toolbar and also the <$vars fill={{$:/plugins/ajh/plugintools/stylesheet!!button-color}} stroke={{$:/plugins/ajh/plugintools/stylesheet!!button-outline-color}} p={{$:/plugins/ajh/plugintools/image!!path}}><> plugintools tab to the Sidebar. The View Toolbar button becomes <$list filter='[prefix[yes]]'><$vars fill={{$:/plugins/ajh/plugintools/stylesheet!!button-color}} stroke={{$:/plugins/ajh/plugintools/stylesheet!!button-outline-color}} p={{$:/plugins/ajh/plugintools/image!!path}}><> <$list filter='[prefix[yes]]'>{{$:/language/Buttons/Plugged/Caption}} when selected and then the tiddler title appears in the list of tiddlers to be packed on the <$vars fill={{$:/plugins/ajh/plugintools/stylesheet!!button-color}} stroke={{$:/plugins/ajh/plugintools/stylesheet!!button-outline-color}} p={{$:/plugins/ajh/plugintools/image!!path}}><> Sidebar tab. The list can be sorted using drag and drop. To drag an item, select it, then hold down the mouse or track-pad button while you drag it to a new location in the list. Release the button to drop the item into place. Unneeded plugin tiddlers can be removed from the list by using the <$list filter='[prefix[yes]]'><$vars fill={{$:/plugins/ajh/plugintools/stylesheet!!button-color}} stroke={{$:/plugins/ajh/plugintools/stylesheet!!button-outline-color}} p={{$:/plugins/ajh/plugintools/image!!path}}><> <$list filter='[prefix[yes]]'>{{$:/language/Buttons/Plugged/Caption}} plugintools button in the tiddler or on the plugintools tab on the Sidebar. The ''Pack Plugin'' button on the sidebar tab opens the plugin template in edit view and fills in the dependents field. Set the plugin title, e.g. $:/plugins/yourname/pluginname, and also the following fields on the tiddler: |!Field |!Value | |''description'' |Plugin description | |''list'' |Names of exposed plugin information tiddlers, for example: readme license | |''name'' |Plugin name (only needed for themes) | |''plugin-type'' |Either "plugin" for a regular plugin, "theme" for a theme, or "language" for a language pack | |[[additional|https://tiddlywiki.com/#Plugin%20Fields]] |Add as needed | Remove tiddlers by only selecting tiddlers you want in the plugin and hit ''Pack Plugin'' again. [[Export|https://tiddlywiki.com/#How%20to%20export%20tiddlers]] the plugin using JSON format for library format. Simply drag $:/plugins/ajh/plugintools to the top of your tiddlywiki display, save and reload or drag $:/pluginlibrary/ajh/released to the top of your display, save and reload and then install the plugin or any of the other plugins from my library using the Get more plugins button on the Plugins tab in the ControlPanel. This plugin comprises: * Icon * Template * Stylesheet * Sidebar tab * Caption and hint", "title": "$:/plugins/ajh/plugintools/readme" }, "$:/plugins/ajh/plugintools/sidebar": { "text": "\define remove() -[[$(currentTiddler)$]] \define my-svg() \end \define drop-actions() <$action-listops $tiddler='$:/plugins/ajh/plugintools/list' $subfilter='+[insertbefore:currentTiddler]'/> \end <$list filter='[list[$:/plugins/ajh/plugintools/list]]'>
<$droppable actions=<>>
 
<$link to={{!!title}}> <$view field='title'/> <$button tooltip={{$:/language/Buttons/Plugged/Hint}} aria-label={{$:/language/Buttons/Plugged/Caption}} class=<>> <$action-listops $tiddler='$:/plugins/ajh/plugintools/list' $field='list' $subfilter=<>/> <$list filter='[prefix[yes]]'> <$vars fill={{$:/plugins/ajh/plugintools/stylesheet!!button-color}} stroke={{$:/plugins/ajh/plugintools/stylesheet!!button-outline-color}} m='30.1 31' path={{$:/plugins/ajh/plugintools/image!!path}}> <> <$list filter='[prefix[yes]]'> <$text text={{$:/language/Buttons/Plugged/Caption}}/>
<$wikify name='a' text={{$:/plugins/ajh/plugintools/list}}> <$button> <$action-setfield $tiddler='$:/plugins/ajh/plugintools/plugin' text=<> dependents={{$:/plugins/ajh/plugintools/list!!list}}/> <$action-sendmessage $message='tm-edit-tiddler' $param='$:/plugins/ajh/plugintools/plugin'/> Pack Plugin ", "title": "$:/plugins/ajh/plugintools/sidebar", "tags": "$:/tags/SideBar", "list-before": "", "caption": "<$list filter='[prefix[yes]]'>{{$:/plugins/ajh/plugintools/image}} <$list filter='[prefix[yes]]'>{{$:/language/SideBar/Plugintools/Caption}}" }, "$:/plugins/ajh/plugintools/stylesheet": { "text": ".tc-tab-buttons button.tc-tab-selected { fill: {{!!tab-icon-selected-color}}; stroke: {{!!tab-icon-outline-color}}; } .tc-tab-buttons button:not(.tc-tab-selected) { fill: {{!!tab-icon-unselected-color}}; } .tc-plugintools { stroke: {{!!button-outline-color}}; stroke-width:3; fill: {{!!button-color}}; height:1em; width:1em; }", "title": "$:/plugins/ajh/plugintools/stylesheet", "tags": "$:/tags/Stylesheet", "tab-icon-unselected-color": "#999", "tab-icon-selected-color": "#ff0", "tab-icon-outline-color": "#000", "caption": "Plugin Tools", "button-outline-color": "#000", "button-color": "#ff0" }, "$:/plugins/ajh/plugintools/template": { "text": "\define add() [[$(currentTiddler)$]] \define remove() -[[$(currentTiddler)$]] \define my-svg() \end <$list filter='[list[$:/plugins/ajh/plugintools/list]is[current]]'><$button tooltip={{$:/language/Buttons/Plugged/Hint}} aria-label={{$:/language/Buttons/Plugged/Caption}} class=<>> <$action-listops $tiddler='$:/plugins/ajh/plugintools/list' $field='list' $subfilter=<>/> <$list filter='[prefix[yes]]'> <$vars fill={{$:/plugins/ajh/plugintools/stylesheet!!button-color}} stroke={{$:/plugins/ajh/plugintools/stylesheet!!button-outline-color}} m='30.1 31' path={{$:/plugins/ajh/plugintools/image!!path}}> <> <$list filter='[prefix[yes]]'> <$text text={{$:/language/Buttons/Plugged/Caption}}/> <$list filter='[all[current]!list[$:/plugins/ajh/plugintools/list]]'><$button tooltip={{$:/language/Buttons/Shadow/Hint}} aria-label={{$:/language/Buttons/Shadow/Caption}} class=<>> <$action-listops $tiddler='$:/plugins/ajh/plugintools/list' $field='list' $subfilter=<>/> <$list filter='[prefix[yes]]'> {{$:/plugins/ajh/plugintools/image}} <$list filter='[prefix[yes]]'> <$text text={{$:/language/Buttons/Shadow/Caption}}/> ", "title": "$:/plugins/ajh/plugintools/template", "tags": "$:/tags/ViewToolbar", "list-after": "$:/core/ui/Buttons/more-tiddler-actions", "description": "{{$:/language/Buttons/Shadow/Hint}}", "caption": "{{$:/plugins/ajh/plugintools/image}} {{$:/language/Buttons/Shadow/Caption}}" } } }
title: $:/plugins/ajh/plugintools
